body:
I understand that it's a donator kit, but Assassin is WAY over powered in Nexus. Invisibility and no armour makes this kit way too over powered, because the person using it can switch to an empty inventory slot and become fully invisible and virtually impossible to kill with a strafe.
What are your thoughts on adding armor or removing the kit?
body_tagged:

What are your thoughts on adding armor or removing the kit?
title: Assassin Kit for Nexus

replies.body: very easy to kill an assassin IMO.
replies.body_tagged: very easy to kill an assassin IMO.

replies.body: Add armour. I haven't had any problems with assassin yet
replies.body_tagged: Add armour. I haven't had any problems with assassin yet

replies.body: Now that it is a Diamond only rank, the amount of people using it will be less and to be honest it doesn't seem that hard to beat.
replies.body_tagged: Now that it is a Diamond only rank, the amount of people using it will be less and to be honest it doesn't seem that hard to beat.

replies.body: kit assassin is really easy to kill with pyro.  just light them up baby

replies.body: Every kit is easy to kill with pyro
replies.body_tagged: Every kit is easy to kill with pyro

replies.body: They're holding a sword in their right hand or our left. So aim to the right of the sword...they're super easy to kill with no armour. Just switch to barb and 3-shot them tbh.
replies.body_tagged: They're holding a sword in their right hand or our left. So aim to the right of the sword...they're super easy to kill with no armour. Just switch to barb and 3-shot them tbh.
